```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(ipumsr)
library(chirps)
library(sf)
```


```{r}
tapajos <- chirps::tapajos

# sample three points within the Tapajos area
set.seed(1234)
tp_point <- st_sample(tapajos, 3)

# coerce as sf points
tp_point <- st_as_sf(tp_point)

dt <- get_chirps(tp_point, dates = c("2013-01-01","2018-12-31"))
```

```{r}
plot(tapajos)

dt

precip_indices(dt) %>% tibble() %>% print(n = Inf)
```
